h2_title: Pale-Axe Stalwart Boss Fight and Guide
content: The health bar for the Pale-Axe Stalwart will appear as soon as you approach the open area. There will be Revenants and Bull Soldiers fighting around you, but you can ignore these and focus solely on the Pale-Axe Stalwart for this miniboss fight.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pale-Axe_Stalwart.md', within the main section titled 'Pale-Axe Stalwart', specifically from the subsection 'Pale-Axe Stalwart Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
The health bar for the Pale-Axe Stalwart will appear as soon as you approach the open area. There will be Revenants and Bull Soldiers fighting around you, but you can ignore these and focus solely on the Pale-Axe Stalwart for this miniboss fight.
